article_text:
The announcements just keep coming. And the two newest additions to the GOP presidential field this week make 12 announced candidates. Former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush and mogul Donald Trump both entered the GOP race this week.

And two sources tell U.S. News that Vice President Joe Biden has a timeline for his own 2016 decision. Conventional wisdom is that he'll eventually decline, but the people who know him best aren't so sure.

Here's David Catanese with more:

article_metadata.title: The Ever-Expanding Presidential Field

og.description: This week both Jeb Bush and Donald Trump entered the fray.

article_summary:
And the two newest additions to the GOP presidential field this week make 12 announced candidates.
And two sources tell U.S. News that Vice President Joe Biden has a timeline for his own 2016 decision.
Jeb Bush and mogul Donald Trump both entered the GOP race this week.
Conventional wisdom is that he'll eventually decline, but the people who know him best aren't so sure.
The announcements just keep coming.
